name: Pepeki
description: What is Pepeki(PEPEKI)? Pepeki, a cryptocurrency with a total supply of 420,690 billion tokens. There will be no additional tokens minted. The initial liquidity pair of the currency is WBNB and the tokens are locked for one year. The 6.9% of the supply was allocated to the presale and the remaining amount of the supply is locked for staking, centralized exchanges, and partnerships. In 2023, Pepe revived the meme's by breaking $1Billion MC in record time and getting listed on Binance alongside Floki! Now it's time for the most bullish combo to break both records. Get ready for Pepeki, the long lost son of Pepe & Floki!
